div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 19px; white-space: nowrap; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
text-align: center

display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 85px; white-space: nowrap; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
